name: Double Deluxe
description: Luxurious Double Retreat: Indulge in luxury and comfort in our double deluxe rooms, perfect for couples seeking a romantic getaway or travelers desiring extra space. With upscale amenities and elegant décor, these rooms offer a lavish retreat.
